channel.title: cloze on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in cloze on Barefoot Rob

item.title: new idea that I miggghhttttttt make
item.description: 22:48 Monday 06 March 2017 JST I needed to make a cloze test today. All the ones I saw online were either hard to use or required payment (or both?) In my preferred version, user would just slap in a bunch of text, and then click on the words to extract from the source. Those words would be replaced with blanks and moved down to sorted list at bottom.
